directions: Stir together the mayonnaise and Ranch dressing, and spread onto one slice of bread. Place the fontina and Havarti cheese slices on the bread, then top with roasted red pepper, pepperoncini, pickle and lettuce. Top with the other slice of bread.
ingredients: 1/4 cup jarred roasted red pepper, drained and chopped
title: Roasted Red Pepper and Cheese Sandwich
